title: Gloom Spawn
desc:
Post 1798
- While this is in your ID zone, whenever you play a card that affects one player (other than yourself), you will also apply **Gloom** 1 to them.
- Cards you draw for any reason will have the <:gloom:1187518684143550605> color added to them if they don't already have it, unless they have a color that decreases Gloom.
